#   Useage


```
<footer-bar-2>
	<template slot="links">
        <a href="#" title="Site Map">Site Map</a>
        <a href="#" title="FAQs">FAQs</a>
        <a href="#" title="Privacy Policy">Privacy Policy</a>
        <a href="#" title="Terms">Terms</a>
    </template>
</footer-bar-2>
```
